title: Daniel Hamburg
deleted: Hamburg was arrested outside of a [[Wal-Mart]] store in [[Ukiah, California|Ukiah]], [[California]] in 2000 while protesting for the legalization of [[marijuana]].<ref>{{cite news|url=http://norml.org/index.cfm?Group_ID=4099|title=Former Congressmen Arrested By Wal-Mart Manager For Protesting The Store Where A Decriminalization Petitioner Was Arrested Days Before|publisher=[[NORML]]|date=February 24, 2000|accessdate=October 17, 2010}}</ref>

Hamburg has endorsed the religious teachings of [[Adi Da]].<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.aboutadidam.org/testimonials/politics/dan_hamburg.html|title=Politics and Spirituality: A Personal Journey|last=Hamburg|first=Daniel|date=August 18, 2001}}</ref>
